Today, tourist destinations are opening up again, people are getting vaccinated and life is returning to normal
Planning your trip will require navigation around various travel restrictions
Icon with a sign that says open
Icon of an airplane taking off
Retrieve detailed information on measures in place for a selected country
We are committed to the open source, learn where you can contribute yourself
We would love to hear from you and what you think about the app. Contact developers directly.
Select country from the list. You can also opt in on downloading data for later use
Access stats per region, find about travel restrictions, countermeasures, health info and other information
Country regions and their respective color codes
Icon representing regions in a state
All necessary travel info when planning your new adventure

Select starting, destination and (optionally) transit country and get ready before boarding your flight
